WE RETAIL

As a business – and as people – we operate with integrity and show respect for each other and the environment. For over 40 years we’ve been dreaming big and demonstrating the best of what business can be.

OUR ROOTS

We.Retail is a business-to-consumer retail application built with AEM Mobile.

A STARTUP IDEA

This application works in conjunction with the We.Retail Sales Associate (clientelling) application and the We.Retail Screen application, both also built with AEM Mobile in addition to the AEM Site for We.Retail for a total end-to-end retail digital experience.

Within the We.Retail consumer application, the AEM Author is able to update all content (everything is content), including designs, navigation, add/remove pages, restrict content access, add/remove video, images, text, content fragments, manage beacon inventory and beacon behaviour on device, manage store locations and leverage the GPS sensor on device to find stores near you, create in-app messages, send push notifications, deep-dive into analytics, update product catalog, target content, add events to your calendar, moderate social communities, add new locales and update everything over the air (OTA) with ContentSync.
